T.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,de.emp_no as dept_emp_emp_no,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date, d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where e.emp_no = 231013

F.query: select e.emp_no as emp_no ,de.emp_no as dept_emp_emp_no,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date, d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no full join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where e.emp_no = 231013

select e.emp_no as emp_no ,de.emp_no as dept_emp_emp_no,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date, d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on s.salary = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where e.emp_no = 231013

select e.emp_no as emp_no ,de.emp_no as dept_emp_emp_no,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date, d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.salary full join titles t on s.salary = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where e.emp_no = 231013
